changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE POLL_OPTION ( id number generated always as identity ( start with 1 increment by 1 ) primary key, title varchar(512), poll_id number, constraint fk_poll_option_poll_id foreign key (poll_id) references POLL (id) );

CREATE TABLE VOTE ( id number generated always as identity ( start with 1 increment by 1 ) primary key, poll_id number, user_id number, poll_option_id number, constraint fk_vote_poll_id foreign key (poll_id) references POLL (id), constraint fk_vote_poll_option_id foreign key (poll_option_id) references POLL_OPTION (id), constraint fk_vote_user_id foreign key (user_id) references USER (id) );
